thread.section_title: Pullman London St Pancras Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Comfortable and central
thread.title_full: Comfortable and central - Review of Pullman London St Pancras Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: NQPsych2U
title: Comfortable and central
text:
The Pullman St Pancras was an enjoyable experience.
The staff are knowledgable and fluent in multiple languages.
The lobby is modern and welcoming.
The king bed and pillows were very comfortable along with the functional room layout.
The hallways were dated and the shower was small, although expected in London.
The location is an easy commute to Kings Cross underground and National Rail.
It is worth investing in an oyster card while staying at the hotel and enjoy delicious food next door at Albertini.
Book your room in advance as prices increase rapidly.
